tool_description: Applies various discount types including percentage, fixed amount, and promotional discounts to invoice line items with proper calculations and documentation.

line_items_data.description: Array of line item data to apply discounts to

discount_codes.description: Array of discount codes to apply

volume_discount_threshold.description: Minimum amount for volume discount eligibility

apply_early_payment_discount.description: Whether to apply early payment discount

error_messages: Invalid discount code: One or more discount codes are not valid or have expired. Verify discount codes are current and applicable.
Discount rate out of range: Discount rates must be between 0 and 100 percent. Adjust discount percentages accordingly.
Volume threshold not met: Order total does not meet volume discount threshold. Increase order amount or remove volume discount.
Conflicting discounts: Multiple discounts cannot be combined. Choose a single discount type to apply.
Early payment rate invalid: Early payment discount rate must be between 0 and 10 percent. Adjust rate accordingly.
usage: Provide line_items_data and optionally specify discount_codes, customer_discount_rate, volume discount settings, or early payment discount options. The tool will calculate and apply applicable discounts.

discounted_items.description: Line items with applied discounts and adjusted totals

total_discount_amount.description: Total dollar amount of all discounts applied

discount_descriptions.description: Descriptions of all discounts applied for invoice documentation

final_subtotal.description: Subtotal after all discounts are applied
